name: SpaceJunk-DEMO
description:
In the deep outer space, countless galaxies and planets are under cultural doctrines that every artist must follow. However, the so-called street artists have turned their backs on these rules and make their own fame.

Thanks to their liberal chaotic customs, raising attention and fame, Space patrols are in charge repressing their actions.

- ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  - ~  

Ceres and Juno are a duo of street artists. A paintress and a rapper, trabelling from planet to planet in their spaceship, showing their arto to the universe.

Along their friends and collaborators, Cordelia, Estigia and Nix, they must escape the space patrols and reach their spaceship
